name: Yazhini
greetingText: I really like your name, by the way! 😊
wishText:
Thank you for being the incredible person in my life with love and joy. 😉
 And don't worry about Yazhighai, we'll make it soon.
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Many many happy blah. blah..
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, 🤔 I wanted to do something
outroText:
And sorry about that bunny 😁 
 Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
